parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Transfer weapons and magazines from cargo of object into weapon pool (used in campaign to transfer weapons into next mission).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[pickWeaponPool]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[pickWeaponPool]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Command Group: Weapon Pool|Command Group: Weapon Pool]]
</value></part></template>
